title: 2017 USARL season
text:
The 2017 USA Rugby League season is the seventh season of the <a href="USA%20Rugby%20League">USA Rugby League</a> National Premiership competition, and its third as the undisputed top-level <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> competition in the <a href="United%20States">United States</a>. Twelve teams compete for the USARL Championship. The season began on Saturday, June 3, and concluded with the Championship Final on Saturday, August 26.
Team changes.
The <a href="Bucks%20County%20Sharks">Bucks County Sharks</a> and the <a href="DC%20Slayers">DC Slayers</a> folded after the 2016 season bringing the number of teams down to 12.
Regular season.
Teams in the North Conference play in an eight-round regular season with semi-finals on August 5 and final on August 12. South Conference teams play a six-round regular season with semi-finals on July 29 and final on August 12
Final.
The <a href="Atlanta%20Rhinos">Atlanta Rhinos</a> defeated the <a href="New%20York%20Knights">New York Knights</a> 32-18 in the grand final to become the 2017 USARL National Champions.
